IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Monthly"), License_Term__c = 36, ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, "Net 30") ), "Monthly Recurring - 36 MO ARR",(
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Monthly"), License_Term__c =36, ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, "Due in advance") ), "Monthly Recurring - 36 MO ADV",( IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Monthly"), License_Term__c =12, ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, "Net 30") ), "Monthly Recurring - 12 MO ARR",(
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Monthly"), License_Term__c =12, ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, "Due in advance") ), "Monthly Recurring - 12 MO ADV",( IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Monthly"), License_Term__c =60, ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, "Net 30") ), "Monthly Recurring - 60 MO ARR",(
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Monthly"), License_Term__c =60, ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, "Due in advance") ), "Monthly Recurring - 60 MO ADV",(
IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Annual"), License_Term__c = 36, ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, "Net 30") ), "Annual Recurring - 36 MO ARR",(
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Annual"), License_Term__c =36, ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, "Due in advance") ), "Annual Recurring - 36 MO ADV",( IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Annual"), License_Term__c =12, ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, "Net 30") ), "Annual Recurring - 12 MO ARR",(
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Annual"), License_Term__c =12, ISPICKVAL(Payment_Terms__c, "Due in advance") ), "Annual Recurring - 12 MO ADV",(
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Express'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Annual"), License_Term__c =36, Small_Fleet_Opportunity__c=True), "Annual Recurring - 36 MO ADV",(

CustomField.label: NS Billing Schedule
